explains: adj. （旅程）颠簸的；不平的，多凸块的；经历困难，处境艰难

sentences.en: Buckle up; it gets a bit bumpy!
sentences.cn: 系紧安全带；它变得有一点颠簸！

sentences.en: A machine designed for remote areas with bumpy roads and a host of other calamities.
sentences.cn: 这台机器是为偏远地区崎岖不平的道路和许多其他灾难而设计的。

sentences.en: "It is still difficult for a biped robot to walk on a bumpy surface, even on Earth," the official said.
sentences.cn: “即使在地球上，两足机器人也很难在崎岖不平的地面上行走。”这位官员说。
